fullText: This production of Craig Lucas's memory play about a young bride who mysteriously switches souls with an old man feels more like a rehearsal than a revival.
dtliExcerpt: This production of Craig Lucas's memory play about a young bride who mysteriously switches souls with an old man feels more like a rehearsal than a revival.
